CustomField.formula:
IF( Reg_Advisory_Board__c = True,
IF( ISBLANK( Registrant_Name__r.AB_Suffix__c )=False ,Registrant_Name__r.AB_Last_Name__c &", "&Registrant_Name__r.AB_Suffix__c
,Registrant_Name__r.AB_Last_Name__c)
,
IF( ISBLANK(Registrant_Name__r.Suffix)=False ,Registrant_Name__r.LastName&", "&Registrant_Name__r.Suffix
,Registrant_Name__r.LastName))
CustomField.label: Badge Last Name
